verses.verse: Then Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mattan <S%H4977><s%>, and Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pashur <S%H6583><s%>, and Jucal <S%H3116><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelemiah <S%H8018><s%>, and Pashur <S%H6583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchiah <S%H4441><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, He that remaineth <S%H3427><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, by the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and by the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>: but he that goeth forth <S%H3318><s%> to the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%>; for he shall have his life <S%H5315><s%> for a prey <S%H7998><s%>, and shall live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H2425><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, This city <S%H5892><s%> shall surely <S%H5414><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon's <S%H894><s%> army <S%H2428><s%>, which shall take <S%H3920><s%> it.

Therefore the princes <S%H8269><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, We beseech thee, let this man <S%H376><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>: for thus <S%H3651><s%> he weakeneth <S%H7503><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> that remain <S%H7604><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%>, and the hands <S%H3027><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%>, in speaking <S%H1696><s%> such words <S%H1697><s%> unto them: for this man <S%H376><s%> seeketh <S%H1875><s%> not the welfare <S%H7965><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%>, but the hurt <S%H7451><s%>. welfare: Heb. peace

Then Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold, he is in your hand <S%H3027><s%>: for the king <S%H4428><s%> is not he that can <S%H3201><s%> do any thing <S%H1697><s%> against you.

Then took <S%H3947><s%> they Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> him into the dungeon <S%H953><s%> of Malchiah <S%H4441><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hammelech <S%H4428><s%>, that was in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison <S%H4307><s%>: and they let down <S%H7971><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> with cords <S%H2256><s%>. And in the dungeon <S%H953><s%> there was no water <S%H4325><s%>, but mire <S%H2916><s%>: so Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> sunk <S%H2883><s%> in the mire <S%H2916><s%>. of Hammelech: or, of the king

Now when Ebedmelech <S%H5663><s%> the Ethiopian <S%H3569><s%>, one <S%H376><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> which was in the king's <S%H4428><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> that they had put <S%H5414><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> in the dungeon <S%H953><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> then sitting <S%H3427><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>;
Ebedmelech <S%H5663><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the king's <S%H4428><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

My lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, these men <S%H582><s%> have done evil <S%H7489><s%> in all that they have done <S%H6213><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, whom they have cast <S%H7993><s%> into the dungeon <S%H953><s%>; and he is like to die <S%H4191><s%> for <S%H6440><s%> hunger <S%H7458><s%> in the place <S%H8478><s%> where he is: for there is no more bread <S%H3899><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%>. he is like: Heb. he will die

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Ebedmelech <S%H5663><s%> the Ethiopian <S%H3569><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> from hence thirty <S%H7970><s%> men <S%H582><s%> with thee <S%H3027><s%>, and take up <S%H5927><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> out of the dungeon <S%H953><s%>, before he die <S%H4191><s%>. with thee: Heb. in thine hand

So Ebedmelech <S%H5663><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> with him <S%H3027><s%>, and went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> under the treasury <S%H214><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> thence old <S%H1094><s%> cast clouts <S%H5499><s%> and old <S%H1094><s%> rotten rags <S%H4418><s%>, and let them down <S%H7971><s%> by cords <S%H2256><s%> into the dungeon <S%H953><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>.

And Ebedmelech <S%H5663><s%> the Ethiopian <S%H3569><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, Put <S%H7760><s%> now these old <S%H1094><s%> cast clouts <S%H5499><s%> and rotten rags <S%H4418><s%> under thine armholes <S%H679><s%> <S%H3027><s%> under the cords <S%H2256><s%>. And Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so.

So they drew up <S%H4900><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> with cords <S%H2256><s%>, and took him up <S%H5927><s%> out of the dungeon <S%H953><s%>: and Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> remained <S%H3427><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison <S%H4307><s%>.

Then Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto him into the third <S%H7992><s%> entry <S%H3996><s%> that is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: and the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, I will ask <S%H7592><s%> thee a thing <S%H1697><s%>; hide <S%H3582><s%> nothing from me. third: or, principal

Then Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%>, If I declare <S%H5046><s%> it unto thee, wilt thou not surely <S%H4191><s%> put me to death <S%H4191><s%>? and if I give thee counsel <S%H3289><s%>, wilt thou not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me?

So Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> secretly <S%H5643><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, As the LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, that made <S%H6213><s%> us this soul <S%H5315><s%>, I will not put thee to death <S%H4191><s%>, neither will I give <S%H5414><s%> thee into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> thy life <S%H5315><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> unto Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; If thou wilt assuredly <S%H3318><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon's <S%H894><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%>, then thy soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%>, and this city <S%H5892><s%> shall not be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>; and thou shalt live <S%H2421><s%>, and thine house <S%H1004><s%>:

But if thou wilt not go forth <S%H3318><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon's <S%H894><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%>, then shall this city <S%H5892><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, and they shall burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire <S%H784><s%>, and thou shalt not escape out <S%H4422><s%> of their hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, I am afraid <S%H1672><s%> of the Jews <S%H3064><s%> that are fallen <S%H5307><s%> to the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, lest they deliver <S%H5414><s%> me into their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and they mock <S%H5953><s%> me.

But Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, They shall not deliver <S%H5414><s%> thee. Obey <S%H8085><s%>, I beseech thee, the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, which I speak <S%H1696><s%> unto thee: so it shall be well <S%H3190><s%> unto thee, and thy soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%>.
But if thou refuse <S%H3986><s%> to go forth <S%H3318><s%>, this is the word <S%H1697><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath shewed <S%H7200><s%> me:

And, behold, all the women <S%H802><s%> that are left <S%H7604><s%> in the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah's <S%H3063><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> shall be brought forth <S%H3318><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon's <S%H894><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%>, and those women shall say <S%H559><s%>, Thy friends <S%H582><s%> <S%H7965><s%> have set thee on <S%H5496><s%>, and have prevailed <S%H3201><s%> against thee: thy feet <S%H7272><s%> are sunk <S%H2883><s%> in the mire <S%H1206><s%>, and they are turned away <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%>. Thy friends: Heb. Men of thy peace

So they shall bring out <S%H3318><s%> all thy wives <S%H802><s%> and thy children <S%H1121><s%> to the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>: and thou shalt not escape out <S%H4422><s%> of their hand <S%H3027><s%>, but shalt be taken <S%H8610><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>: and thou shalt cause this city <S%H5892><s%> to be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>. thou shalt cause: Heb. thou shalt burn, etc
Then said <S%H559><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, Let no man <S%H376><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> of these words <S%H1697><s%>, and thou shalt not die <S%H4191><s%>.

But if the princes <S%H8269><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> that I have talked <S%H1696><s%> with thee, and they come <S%H935><s%> unto thee, and say <S%H559><s%> unto thee, Declare <S%H5046><s%> unto us now what thou hast said <S%H1696><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, hide <S%H3582><s%> it not from us, and we will not put thee to death <S%H4191><s%>; also what the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto thee:

Then thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto them, I presented <S%H5307><s%> my supplication <S%H8467><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, that he would not cause me to return <S%H7725><s%> to Jonathan's <S%H3083><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, to die <S%H4191><s%> there.

Then came <S%H935><s%> all the princes <S%H8269><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, and asked <S%H7592><s%> him: and he told <S%H5046><s%> them according to all these words <S%H1697><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%>. So they left off speaking <S%H2790><s%> with him; for the matter <S%H1697><s%> was not perceived <S%H8085><s%>. they: Heb. they were silent from him

So Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison <S%H4307><s%> until the day <S%H3117><s%> that Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%>: and he was there when Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%>.
